body: I think we can remove it. This was a minor optimization (to prune zero elements if possible) but it can be become expensive for non-scalar values. We could have a special case and only check this if `nDimensionV == 0` but I'm not sure it's worth it.
body_html: I think we can remove it. This was a minor optimization (to prune zero elements if possible) but it can be become expensive for non-scalar values. We could have a special case and only check this if nDimensionV == 0 but I'm not sure it's worth it.
body_text: I think we can remove it. This was a minor optimization (to prune zero elements if possible) but it can be become expensive for non-scalar values. We could have a special case and only check this if nDimensionV == 0 but I'm not sure it's worth it.
